#summary Subversion Source Management Extension

The *svn* extension provides a loader to handle source checked out of Subversion repositories.

= Loader =

Add a line like
{{{
SOURCES=" ...
	svn https://dev.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/
... "
}}}

Or, to load the given URL at a subdirectory of the task directory,
{{{
SOURCES=" ...
	svn https://dev.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ sub/directory
... "
}}}
